description: Meet J. T. Knightley, another Oklahoma native (and friend of Cody Kyler) who now makes his home in Florida. Sexy 19 year old J. T. is a student by day, studying aviation science, and works full time as a front desk clerk at a popular gay resort. He's 6 feet tall, 145 lbs., with a slender 29' waist. He's got brown hair, blue eyes, a luscious 7' cut cock, and he's a top. 'Fuck yeah, I love it', he told us. 'I've tried bottoming, but I guess it just doesn't do nuthin' for me. But when I slide my dick into some dude's tight ass, I get hard as fuck. And I can stay that way for a long time. I mean, I've fucked guys for 2 or 3 hours... until they're like whining li'l pussies. Haha'. That sounded like a good trait for a porn star to have, we told him. 'Well, dude, I get really turned on by fresh, young guys. You know... innocent dudes. If I can get them to kiss or make out, I fuckin' got 'em! Haha. I'll get them so hard they'll beg me to fuck 'em. But not before they're down on their knees sucking my dick'. This is a boy we're going to keep in a box at the office :-)
title: CitiBoyz 54: 'Keep 'em Cummin'', Scene #05
